conditions.value: The fate (plot) of this world lessened, this makes the plot armor of the each characters notably less reliable, if they needed plot to survive, then is provable that now they will die or be severely harmed
We recomed you to buy Aura (RWBY) in your earliest convenience, as will bypass one of the weakness of Yaoyorozu Momo
We also recommend you to buy each of the different classes as a tier 1 Template Stack, as ech one will give you valuable experience in their different styles of combat
You will stay in the world until the end of the year at minimum

desc:
Well Contractor, it seems that a newbie was ganked in real life just before we could finalize his contract and send him in his merry way, and now we have a complete build and a selected timeline but no contractor to farm it, and the Archangel of Benevolence is breathing down our necks rushing us into finding someone to fulfill her fallen Contractors job, lucky us that you came along...

reward: A copy of Sanjouno Haruhime and a copy of a piece of the shattered Killing Stone for each in your Retinue
author: myfunvideos
title: For Beauty's Own Gain - Killing Stone!

objectives.value: Have fun with an Amazon and climax inside them. (Repeatable)
Sell your 'services' (and body) in the Red Light District. Bring in the Valis for the Ishtar Familia. (Repeatable)

objectives.reward: Half Credit value of each member of the Freya Familia killed.
objectives.value: Participate and destroy the Freya Familia after the Ishtar Familia obtains the Killing Stone fragments.

objectives.reward: Ishtar and her Familia complete Trust in you
objectives.value: Make Freya disappear for Ishtar's satisfaction whether by Killing her and sending her back to Tenkai or Selling her.
Somehow, someway, defeat Bell Cranel, by any means necessary.

objectives.reward: Instant Capture of Phryne Jamil. We won't blame you if Sell her. You can also scrub the memory of her violation from your mind.
objectives.value: Do your absolute best to endure Phryne's advances and having her way with you until the Freya and her Familia are gone.

conditions.value: Protect the Killing Stone from being destroyed prematurely before the Ritual.
Bindings on Haruhime will not work for this Mission as she must 'die' for Ritual to transpire.
Goddess Ishtar must not be killed before she can exact her revenge.
Cannot dissuade Ishtar Familia by using some other method than the Killing Stone Ritual
This Haruhime (if 'killed' by successful Ritual) cannot be revived, as described by Takemikazuchi by other methods of Resurrection

desc:
Listen up, Contractor, because this Mission will be...while not necessarily hard, it will be very tricky.

For every Renard, they each contain a unique and powerful Spell, a Youjutsu, that is coveted and kept close to whichever God or Goddess gets their hands on them.

One such Renard is Sanjouno Haruhime, a girl who was sold like a slave and brought to the Ishtar Familia with the goal of obtaining her power to 'Level-Up' whenever they want. It essentially grants anyone endowed with the Falna boosted Stats if they were a Level higher than they currently were.

A related item that must be protected for this Mission is an item that, while dark in nature and horribly heretical, can trap the Renard's Youjutsu and Soul and spread it to others by a certain sacrificial ritual, also known as the Killing Stone.

However, because of the actions of a frustrated Aisha Belka, the plan was significantly delayed and later stopped by the Hestia and Freya Familia, both for differing reasons.

You will have two routes you can be brought in, before Aisha destroys the first Killing Stone the Ishtar Familia originally had or sometime before the day of Ishtar Familia's Canon disbanding.

It's simple, allow the Killing Stone Ritual to transpire successfully, trapping the soul of Sanjouno Haruhime into the Killing Stone on the Night of the Full Moon before breaking it to be used for the Ishtar Familia in their war with the Freya Familia.

Good luck!

Deal with them anyway you can be genocide or mass slavery, just deal with for good.

conditions.value: Drop the world crime rate by 50 percent

desc:
Did you ever think that the world of one piece would be more peaceful if everyone just chilled out a bit, well we did so let's find out if it would work. 

Fun fact did you know weed doesn't exist in the one piece universe, so let's change that. Your job is to produce copious amounts of high quality weed by using the seed's we provide you to get as many people high as you can and stop major conflict's by making people to high to fight.
